provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1 . This Order may be cited as the Judicature (Supreme Court) (Rate of
Interest on Judgment Debts) Order, 1999.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The rate of interest payable on every judgment debt shall be twelve per
centum per annum.
                 [ T h e inclusion o f this paye is authorized by L N 102/2001]
